body: CLSK: 9.60-$10.80 is support for upwards continuation

BTCUSD: Bitcoin is bouncing from where it needs to in order to maintain a confident posture for one more push up to new ATH in c of (iii) but we don't yet have enough of an advance off the low to give some confident indication of a low struck. At a minimum I'd like to see a sustained push back over $68.3k

MSTR: Price got the higher high and now has 5 up suggesting that wave circle iv has bottomed / wave v has begun. We don't yet have a confirmed top in place for (i) and this could extend up a bit but a corrective pullback to the 200-210 region can set up a nice long opportunity to play for waves (iii)-(iv)-(v) of circle v ultimately targeting around $300

all Update on Mom: The delirium has passed by the time I saw her so she was largely normal. I am picking her up to take her home. Unfortunately the pathology came back and it was fast growing malignancy. So the journey is likely just beginning. But at any, rate, I am not sure when but I will break away tomorrow to go pick her up.
Good morning

Bitcoin: We don't have a convincing move off of last might's low yet. So, in my view the door to the blue B is at least cracking open. I presume we will know today whether it will take hold. To make sure context is missed that blue count is a detour that slows the path to $72-73K. But $61,300 should hold or wave-(i) is complete and wave-(ii) can take Bitcoin down as low as $54K.
Ether should form a higher third if it is going to put in a larger circle-B. However it is not looking terribly strong. I can imagine it starting down from a weak, completed B anytime.
SUI: I am adding a very small entry order at $1.82. Just a starter.
RIOT has formed a healthy third now but still needs a fourth and fifth to signal a bottom may be in.
MSTR: Loos like wave (ii) is potentially underway, current support for continuation higher in wave v of 5 is $200-$208
RUNE: I am starting to see the remote possibility that an ascending triangle for red B has formed, and it wiil break higher. That is very rare in crypto but slowly looking possible here.
WIF: A larger B is now very probable.

I am starting to become more inclined to trade the ranges we see in meme coins versus wanting the big payout. For example the expected range in MOTHER is 10x from bottom to top. So I am going to play it by scaling in and out. Of course the risk is that it drops out of the range. Then it is toast. But that's why I play these non-assets with small trades. The scaling out orders can be smaller than the entries, so if a breakout actually happens, you have a little in the bank.

BTCUSD: The drop from the weekend high is increasingly looking like a micro 5 down. That can certainly fit into the black bullish primary count so long as support continues to hold. However if we get a corrective bounce from here to a lower high and then takeout $66k and $64.7k impulsively it strongly increases the prospect of the red count which can entail a wider flat forming at the larger degree for a retest of the August low (or lower down to $42k)
COIN: I assume circle b is underway. wave-iv should hold $188 from here.
I am stepping out. I will be back later.
ONDO: If this nano top does not prove to be the B top then it should take the red path.
all Please post requests here for today's crypto webinar. I will cover these tickers and a few requestsBTC, ETH, SOL, RUNE, LINK, BNB, WIF, SUI, MARA, COIN, GBTC, ETHE, APLD, CLSK, MSTR, WULF, GLXY
i have to step off again.
ETHE: Still looking for a wave (v) lower
BTBT: Lousy pattern but has bullish potential of a diagonal.

all Today's Crypto Webinar will begin around 430 PM ETA new webinar for Cryptocurrency Live Video will start soon. You can use this link to join: https://global.gotowebinar.com/join/732353339 Tablet or mobile users, please first download the GoToWebinar app before using the join link.Follow the prompts until Jason screen appears. Check box when prompted for system to remember your name and email address.To post questions, please use the webinar control panel and not the Trading Room.If the link above doesn't work, you can go to JoinWebinar.com and input the code 732353339.
https://youtu.be/UVrkDWceKdA
Good morning
Bticoin has formed five waves off of the top. Therefore, I am waiting for a corrective rally for blue (B). An impulsive rally may mean the black count gets a sticksave

Ether has formed an impusive drop off of its top. That is one step toward assuming that the black count topped as a WXY. But I want to see a drop through $2340 to confirm since this range has been resistant to break down.
KID: can form five waves with one more high. That fifth is 10x, so going to put some lunch money down here.
ONDO: Possible B-top.
all LINK: I am entering a small short position in CB futures with a stop at $12.30, I will add in corrective rallies. Target $7.50
MSTR: Possible five waves off of wave-(ii).
CLSK- Support for circle-4 is $10.60.
I am still avoiding this one without an impulsive setup at (b). Still a junky chart.
Bitcoin: I am fully in the blue count camp. I am watching for a bounce in the $65k region which, instead  of being A, can be all of circle-B if the bounce is impulsive.
APLD: Structure is still suggestive of a B wave but a new high is always positive. The underlying trend is still strong.
It now looks reasonable that Downtober which flipped to Uptober is going back to Downtober. In other words Fliptober. 😂

BTCUSD: Do or die time for this micro variation of the black count. If price is going to give us the wave 5 of c of (iii) up to $74k, this is the spot for a sticksave. Alternatively below $64.7k increases odds of a top in place at which point we'll need to re-evaluate an alternative bullish perspective as this current black count will be defunct at the lower timeframe
ETHUSD: Resounding break below 2538 argues for a top in place. I'd like to see continuation down to the 2325-2400 region for a solid wave 1 of  c lower
GOAT is ideally headed to $4 now.
LINK is starting to speed down hill. It should for a wave-2 by $10.20 or so.
If Bitcoin breaks above $66,800, I will watch for higher lows before I make judgment.
I am signing off. I will see you in the morning.
https://youtu.be/HMbOhegMOLk
Good morning

Bitcoin: My base case for the (B) is a target of $69K. Note, that because B waves morph and change, and hard to nail down, I do not consider this tradeable information. I don't see evidence, yet, that circle-B bottomed.

Ether: No change as its local top is holding. Note the targets below. If this is a true C wave coming up, it should nearly erase all the gains of 2022-24. If it is a wave-5, which I find improbable, it can stop as high as $1800. Ether has been quite a hampster wheel. Lots of spinning but not going anywhere.
BLZ: No change. Perhaps it is finally headed to the .07-08 target. Looks like it wants to dive.
COIN has tapped iv support. It should hold $188.
LINK : I prefer another wave down in wave-1. Over $11.55, it is already in wave-2.
RIOT still needs five waves off its low to indicate a sustainable bottom. From here it should hold $8.45.
MARA- I see no change here. Still needs to take the red path to indicate a low is in.
DOGE may have topped in five waves, alternateively three. From here it can dropped down to 9 cents in wave-2. I am gridding this one. And, I will add it to the next report.
MSTR is still grinding. I see nothing to add today. $187 can be used as a tight stop. Otherwise, let it ride.
ONDO: Added the proposed path for C.
BTCUSD: While price briefly broke support for 4 this quick a strong recovery back above 66,830 favors a low in place and price heading up in wave 5
Kraken is launching its own chain 'INK' for octupus ink on Optimism.
USA: We have a b wave top, or alternatively A of three. I am going to add here, then grid the B-C range.
Ether: I am planning to short Ether at wave-2, if it forms one more wave to finish wave-1.
MEW seems as if it wants to accelerate. It moves directly to 4 cents, I will assume that the 4VER range is behind it.
JOHN: Adding some more as it accelerates back into range.
Kraken has MEW 😂 Might just put a grid bot on it and not mess with loosely grained DEX orders.
MOG: I was looking at the memes on Kraken, one of which is this one. I like the potential leading diagonal and am going to start a grid between .00014 and 0.000000024 to chew up the wave 2 range.
Let me know if any questions before sign off.
I am signing off. I am likely back in a few hours to post the weekly report.

all FYI- My scheduleI am going to be here for the market tomorrow, and plan to drive back up to Washington on Saturday. So, there will be no webinar on Saturday. I will do a makeup early next week if able.
all Note Coinbase Oct. futures expire early tomorrow, at London close I believe. But the novembers are open so you can roll them.
Good morning

Bitcoin: Red is what a diagonal and early bottom in circle-B would look like. However it doesn't have confluence with my $72-73K target, so is not epected. Ideally (B) has topped. If that top holds, Bitcoin should reach $63K-64K before it turns back up toward $72K+
Ether: Three is no change here. I would like to see another low near $2400 before wave-1 bottoms.
ONDO: Possible top in wave-2, although it is quite shallow.
MARA possibly topped in wave-4. Breaking $15 would increase probability that it has.
COIN should reach $236 in wave-v.
LINK needs to turn down here, or red ii will be reset.
Bitcoin has likely formed an intraday top. Ideally it heads toward $64K.
Regarding MOG- Check my math. But the little range box is 4x and including the future box for wave ii, we have 45x. Who needs a breakout with those numbers?
MSTR ideally holds $204 as it grinds higher.

Bitcoin: Because the intraday high almost invalidated the B top, I am going to put out this alternate B wave to $70K. I'm going to be driving for 12H tomorrow and some of you think the market likes to juke me when I'm off the grid. 😂
My first order in SUI was filled at $1.82. Adding next at $1.55.
TAO: I am adding my first order at $489.

BTCUSD: Bitcoin's micro count is on very thin ice here. Back below Wednesday's low and I move into the purple count which entails a potential bigger circle i-ii from the August low. Please note that I do not consider that a high confidence prospect as we really have just 3 up from that August low which would entail a bigger ending diagonal 5 for a bullish potential.As such, I plan on stopping out / taking some risk off below Wednesday's low

ETHUSD: I'd still like to see another micro squiggle to the downside to complete wave circle 1 but this is looking on track for the expected breakdown to 1800-1935 in the next few weeks. Once we get 5 down, we can see track resistance for the wave 2 bounce
MSTR: Possible ending diagonal for wave circle v.

MATICUSD: Getting closer to that long term support for P4 in MATIC/Polygon. That said, for me to get interested in this one again will require at least a clear 5 up for wave 1, if not a larger 5 up for (1)

SOLUSD: Would prefer to see us get a drop from here that holds 116-132 but overall this has been a sideways mess for 7+ months. Below $110 and this can reasonably make its way down to the $65-$80 region to complete a more standard wave 4 as shown in red
WULF: Until this gets a sustained break above the pivot (and then holds above) I can't rule out a wider path for the wave 5 as shown with the purple circle a-b-c up
LINK turned around right on the line and hopefully sees follow through into next week.
I am winding down. Let me know if there are questions going into the close.
I am signing off. I will be on later Sunday. Have a great weekend!

I am adding WEF because it seems to want to attack the ATH. I am going to wait for clarity before I count it. But the ATH is 50x away so, a measely $55 which is what I am starting with, would be $2500 at the top. I will scale into dips and stop at the local low.
Ryan Wilday nightly report seems to have charts flipped ( long term where short term should be). Just letting you know in case you want to adjust for others.
Good morning
Bitcoin hit the A=C for wave-b so it can top anytime. However, structure would look more full with a fourth and fifth.
Ether: I prefer a solid C wave to $2600 before I start thinking about shorting.
MSTR continue to run free despite Bitcoin's constipation. While a break of $210 is hardly bearish in context, that is the tightest support I have. If it breaks, I presume (iv) has started.

COIN: With the local support region holding, I am moving some things around. First of all, I view this rally as b not a fourth. Secondly, we can see where the red count will play out. After one more high, it appears support for the red count will be in the $180 region. I never got that entry I wanted but I am raising my level where I am willing to enter into that $180 region.
MARA: If it breaks Friday's low, I will assume that wave-4 topped.
RUNE invalidated  its bearish 1-2. Now, I'd like to see continuation to $7-$8 to fill in the third.

https://www.elliottwavetrader.net/trading-room#:~:text=BLZ%20is%20getting%20to%20the%20target%20now.%20Note%20I%20am%20not%20going%20to%20catch%20the%20hot%20knife.%20I%20am%20going%20to%20let%20it%20show%20a%201%2D2%20before%20entering.%C2%A0

BTCUSD: Price is taking a much more circuitous route but has maintained support for a run to new ATH, ideally $74k. Price now needs to stay above the weekend low and "should" stay above micro support, $66.9k, for this prospect to remain favorable
TREMP: Watching for a fifth in red to indicate a start to black 3. This one is also on Kraken now.
Please post requests here for tomorrow's Crypto Webinar:I will cover these tickers and a few requestsBTC, ETH, SOL, RUNE, LINK, BNB, WIF, SUI, MARA, COIN, GBTC, ETHE, APLD, CLSK, MSTR, WULF, GLXY
RIOT has gone too high for my view so I am marking it as bottomed in B. But personally, I still need the circle i-ii to form before I have a trade location I like.
ONDO is filling in nicely. I am going to add an order at 62 cents.
IREN appears to be a forming a third extension. That is IF it forms a fourth and fifth.
BTBT: Approaching the zone that has been sold for all year. Will this time be different?
DOGE should hit 16 cents shortly and it should think about forming a top of sorts in that region. Continuing over 16.7 cents will lead me to favor the red count.

I don't know if I have ever seen coins so uncorrelated to Bitcoin. Usually they are directionally correlated but not necessarily in degree. However, we have Bitcoin pushing higher for days with altcoins rolling or setting up to roll. Really interesting and nice to see. It affords more opportunities.
SUI has either formed a deep A or all of (4). Which depends on how it comes out of this support region.

LINK: I don't like the 4H chart with respect to the short trade I was in. However, my view hasn't changed for now. For anyone holding this one in size. Note that a sustained break below $7 turns the entre long-term chart into a three-wave top. It's a chart to be careful with until it shows an impulsive reversal.
FET has nearly tapped support but appears to ned a fourth and fifth before bottoming. I need a desirable A-B setup to take a trade. Right now it isn't on my must have list.

Bitcoin: If (4) starts from here, support is $67,900. Below that I assume this B wave has topped. I will also trail this level as price progresses in case it just grinds toward my ultimate target at $72K-73K. That is not preferred, but not impossible.
Nano support in BTC is now $68,200 after this little zoom zoom to a new HOD*. *=HOD
I am signing off right after the close. If questions, I will check back in a few hours.
Ryan Wilday hi i still have matic in my portfolio but can’t remember the last chart and wave on it- any pointer? Regards
Bitcoin is support is now $68,700. It's possible (b) bottomed and we are going straight to target.
TAO: My first order was hit. My perspective is that a B wave has started so long as the move is three waves.
RUNE is one of the few alts that I wont' be surprised to see at my long term target.
WIF shows a higher low. With all this sideways action, I'd be surprised if it doesn't just go. I am not doing anything because I stacked to my liking.
Good morning

Bitcoin: I am going to take the view that Bitcoin is headed to $72K+ and won't form a local B wave top. However, that requires that it stay over support, currently at $68,400. Below that, the B wave, now in red, will take control again. Make no mistake, it is not too high. A pull into nano support can offer a scalp.
Ether just needs a couple of squiggles to top. After this post, I am going to put on a starter tranche for a short in futures with a stop at $2770. Whether it works or not, it is a cheap short here.
MARA seems to be working on a fifth. Once it tops, I will indicate wave-2. And, I may actually take a trade. Perhaps I am unwell. 😆

BTCUSD: Following the script to perfection. We wanted to see a big move up in (3) to re-align the subwaves of circle 5 with the $74k target for wave c of (iii). Micro support for (4) of circle 5 is $69.1k-$70k but until price makes a sustained break back below $70.9k we can see further direct extensions within (3) which would drag the wave (4) support upwards
MSTR: Nano support is $223 now. I see this as a decent place to take some profit.
Nano support in Bitcoin is now $68,700.
COIN is still making progress to $236.
SUI looks like five off the low, so may already be on its way to $3 for iii.
APLD seems to be eyeing $6 support

MKR is finally in a place where I am willing to trade in size. I have some in my retirement account. But now it near the bottom of two year range. Note that I can care less about the moon targets. They are not realistic when altcoins generally miss their targets. However, the two year range has a potential 10x reward ($400 to $4000). That is more than plenty. So I pyramid down to $200 and pyramid out above $2K.
ONDO: I still see lower as likely with this rally being b of  3, though I am going to watch a pullback for signs the red C is in play.
TAO: So far this action looks like a B wave.
DOGE: I am now in red count camp. But note that an a-wave does not need five waves. Further circle-3 is extended. I'm in buy all the dips mode, and not concerned unless it sustains under 10 cents.

LINK: I am less excited about shorting as it presses the local top. I want to see a rejection that can start the roll. I will lean bullish if it breaks over $13. However, I'd be forced into another murky diagonal.

BTCUSD: Nice continuation in (3), the prospect of which was discussed in the AM post. We now need a sustained break below $72.5k to indicate a top of sorts in place at which point, $70k-$70.6k is now support for (4) / upside followthrough to complete the wave circle 5 of c of (iii). The more directly higher this extends, the more open I become towards considering all of c of (iii) completing perhaps with a stealthy micro (4). $74.2k is and has been the target for wave (iii)
RIOT still hasn't started its nano fourth. If it starts here, $8.80 is support.

ETHUSD: This bounce is a bit higher than ideal but this setup still looks like a decent 1-2 down from the October high here. I entered my first tranche of shorts at 2678 (Coinbase Futures) with a stop at 2825, targeting under $2k. Will update stops and targets as the trade progresses (assuming price turns down)
BTCUSD: We still need a sustained break below $72.5k but this reaction is looking in accord with a top developing here
WIF: Five waves to $2.80 would help the case for continued upside.
We'll do the webinar around 435 PM ET, I'll post the link shortly beforehand
ETHBTC chart - RSI on the Daily is just above 30 (30.56)... dunno if it means anything like it often does for BTCUSD chart.

Webinar will begin in a few minutesall A new webinar for Cryptocurrency Live Video will start soon. You can use this link to join: https://global.gotowebinar.com/join/244487627 Tablet or mobile users, please first download the GoToWebinar app before using the join link.Follow the prompts until Jason screen appears. Check box when prompted for system to remember your name and email address.To post questions, please use the webinar control panel and not the Trading Room.If the link above doesn't work, you can go to JoinWebinar.com and input the code 244487627.
https://youtu.be/rvyOGouKS80
Good morning
Bitcoin is pulling back in wave-iv. However, breaking $69,400 would give us the first indication that it topped.

Ether has hit the point where this bearish setup loses reliability. So, it needs to turn down soon. If it breaks over $2760 it can extend its sideways chop. There isn't a clear setup for a major reversal.
MARA: Possble b of (v). A larger (iv) is possible.
BTCUSD: Overnight action into this AM low looks good for the A of (4). I'd prefer we see a wider flat (as shown) with target support in the $70k-$70.6k zone
RIOT appears to have started (iv), with support at $8.80.
APLD continues its pullback in (ii).
LINK is pushing into a higher wave-(ii).
SQ setup to hit $77. I am going to look at options plays.
I don't like the vol regime in SQ due to earnings being too close. No trade or me.
SUI: I am putting on an order to add at $1.85.
DOGE looks toppy, but breaking 15 cents is needed to bolster that view.
TAO: Possible B wave top. A=C is $398.
Reminder: I am going to step away in about 1HR, and will miss most of the last hour of trading. But we'll catch up in the webinar.

MSTR may be headed to $280 next. Note I added a degree after looking closer at structure. However, despite that, I am going to take substantial profit at $280 since my swing target zone will get a tap there.
Alright I am back. I didn't realize that was the real deal, not the dressed rehearsal. At least I was dressed for it 😂 . It's been a month...
BTC: I prefer a larger B of iv, but I can't say it is a given.
I'm breaking away to get ready for the webinar. See you if you attend.
all Here is the link to the webinar. I will start at 5PM Eastern https://global.gotowebinar.com/join/651073443
BTCUSD: Filling in the (4) nicely.
all Here is the video. I have to leave the house and will post charts later: https://youtu.be/DE3zjH9ktV0
Good morning

Bitcoin formed a more healthy B wave shortly after our webinar yesterday and appears setup to drop into support. Breaking $69,400 would give us the first indication that wave-i has been completed. If it holds support, and pushes to $75K+, the red count will be primary.
Ether drifted downward but basically did nothing overnight. However, ideally it continues to pull away from this top and sees solid follow through to begin the trip to $1800.
MSTR: My data hasn't caught up but it is trolling support. I took off one degree in my chart after this depth but the gestault is unchanged.
APLD: It looked dramatic if you stared at a 5m chart, but nothing changed.
COIN seems to be forming a larger iv.
Bitcoin just needs a little squiggle and jiggle to wrap this up. That is, unless it breaks support. If that occurs, I'm looking down to $65K next.
RyanCrypto Waves RIOT is near support. $8.80 is key.
MARA is widening red iv. I won't be surprised by a big drop out into black. We have very weak overlapping action.
Nice drop out in Ether.
all Ether: I moved my stop on the short CME futures to 2653 to lock in gains so far.
WIF now looks likely to head back to the deeper support zone at $1.93.
CLSK is also retesting its fourth and also needs to turn soon. $10.50 is still support.
STX has a series of lower highs, so can easily fall away here. The setup is in. Will it follow through?

BTCUSD: The move off the 10/29 high is playing out nicely (thus far) and approaching the .382 retrace, $70.4k but I would not be surprised to see a few more squiggles down into support. So long as $70k is holding this appears set up for one more high in the wave (iii) to target $74k+. Alternatively, a sustained break below $69.4k, would favor a top of sorts in place
SQ is also widening (4). There is something in the water today.
I'm going to take partial profits here on the short from Tuesday in ETH futures. I'm moving the stop down on the remaining 60% to 2711.5 Out of 40% at 2585, +93 / +3.4%
SOLUSD: Solana needs a sustained break below $159 to signify a top in place for the d of 4
DOGE: A break below 15 cents should indicate a top in circle-3.
LINK: If this was not my last trading day of the week, I would take a short. It's trying to roll again.
all I am taking half of my Ether short off, leaving the rest on, same stop as posted earlier.
RUNE is close to pressing $5.40 support. As expressed in the webinar, if it breaks, I expect it to head back to the $4.60 region to reset b.
Bitcoin needs to break over $71,350 to lessen the likelihood of another micro low.

COIN is showing the first sign of failure. Failure in this context leaves a few scenarios. A break down to $135 is possible And, a three-wave red A is possible. So, now rather than taking a trade in red b which is less likely to hold, I need to see a clear impulsive reversal. If the case, it will present a 1-2. In short, I am standing aside. No trade, for now.
I am going to sign off right after close so let me know if questions. I will be back later tonight with the nightly report if you think of one after close.
I am signing off. I will be back later tonight. Then you won't see me until Sunday afternoon.
Will be back on after my interview

BTCUSD: Odds of a high in place for (iii) are increasing with price's slight break below $69.4k and then even more so from the strong rejection of this AM corrective bounce. Unless price is able to manage a stick save we likely have a top in place for (iii) as per the purple count. Support for (iv) is $60k-$65k but more favorably within the $63k-$63.8k region
ETHUSD: Maintaining this micro resistance entails price getting a serious drop to complete this circle c of 4. I'm looking for 1780-1935

I am home and the report will be out shortly. The most important market action I see is Bitcoin's seemingly sustained break of $69,400. That makes the red count unlikely to finish taking shape, at least as rendered. Further, Bitcoin pinned just above my target range near $73K. Until something else shows, I count Bitcoin in black wave-2 which can range from $63K to $53,600 based on typical retraces. There is not enough structure to be more precise about expectations yet. It just started.
Good morning

Bitcoin: I suspect that Bitcoin will start a B wave bounce after one more low. Note that although I am filling in this wave-2 as a zigzag we are far from having any indication regarding how this correction likely fills in. it just started.
Ether: While I prefer to see a wave-ii bounce the move off of the low is insignificant so far. That leaves the wave-i open to extension.
DOGE is ideally starting its (B) bounce here.

RIOT needs to turn. However, it appears to need another low and then will be five down. It's base case is a high B wave bounce that indicates a flat. However, probabilities are now swinging toward a breakdown. Five down may setup a move to $5, and I will then no longer consider that C wave higher possible.

ETHUSD: From Friday's bounce we got some nice followthrough down and has formed another reasonable 1-2 within the (3). A sustained break below 2390 can get the party accelerated to the downside at which point we should ideally see followthrough down below $2k without a break back above 2430~
TAO: At $398 I will consider this wave-4 'full'. Then we'll see whether it has intent to break upward.
all I am going to take off the MARA trade because it looks like it can bounce in (ii).

RUNEUSD: Be careful with oversized positions here. Price did reach the $5.92-$6.45 that was expected and has turned down hard (as expected in my primary). A sustained break below $4.69 adds further weight to this case and so far the action off the high looks to be forming impulsively. A breakdown in C can target $1.40-$2
APLD is starting to open the door to the larger support at $3.50. That is just a boundary. I am not saying it goes deep. However, it may reset circle-ii. It is confirmed at $5.48.
CLSK failed to form five waves. It must hold $9.16 or I will not have a bullish view remaining on my chart.
COIN is sitting in support for the red count. No sign of reversal yet.
RUNE reset b as I said was growing in probability. And now it must hold $3.70.
MSTR: Nothing to add today.
BLZ is coming into the target zone. I will wait for a clear reversal before adding to my dusty position.
Folks, my ability to update charts today may be very delayed. I don't have my backup power operating yet at my new house and we have a neighborhood power outage
SOL has gone limp right at the 1.0 indicating a potential B wave top. The red count remains fraught, and may ultimately not hold.
all I adding a little to Bitcoin here, still small, because I see the potential of it hitting $54K before the break to $100K.
ONDO: I am adding here. It will need to reverse over 56 cents for me to add more. And, sustaining below that will lead me to stop out.
GOAT appears corrective off of its low, further, A=C is 26 cents. So, it should drop to that level before bottoming anyway.
STX is starting to fall away in this dumpster fire setup. We'll see how much follow through we get while the greater cycle in Bitcoin is bullish.
MKR: If circle-ii will hold, it should at least form one more low. I have low faith in the black count but watching it anyway. I am more excited about buying in the $400 region.
SQ likely retests $69.90 support.

Took off another small portion of my shorts in Coinbase ETH futures from last week, in at 2678 and exited some now at 2446. +232 / +8.7% I'd like to see price break below the pivot as mentioned earlier today
